title: Cenima Mate
description: Cinema Mate is a responsive movie streaming app.It showcases my skills in front-end development and user interface design.

title: CodeBook
description: CodeBook is a e-commerce platform for buying and reviewing books, featuring secure user authentication and seamless navigation. it ensures a secure and efficient user experience, deployed on Vercel.

title: EzChat
description: EzChat is a real-time chat application.It features user authentication, group chats, and responsive design, showcasing seamless real-time communication.
